thread.title: Under New Bill, Federal Appellate Court Based in California Could Be Split Up
thread.title_full: Under New Bill, Federal Appellate Court Based in California Could Be Split Up - WSJ

author: Sara Randazzo
title: Under New Bill, Federal Appellate Court Based in California Could Be Split Up

organizations.name: ninth u.s. circuit court of appeals

text:
Attempts to break up the sprawling federal appellate court anchored in California have advanced through Congress for decades, introduced with fanfare only to fizzle out in the face of opposition.
But with Republicans now fully in control in Washington, new legislation proposed in the U.S. Senate Thursday to split up the Ninth U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals could gain more momentum than the movement has had in years.
The bill...
